condition.description:
The prostate is a gland in men. It helps make semen, the fluid that contains sperm. The prostate surrounds the tube that carries urine out of the body. As men age, their prostate grows bigger. If it gets too large, it can cause problems. An enlarged prostate is also called benign prostatic hyperplasia (BPH). Most men will get BPH as they get older. Symptoms often start after age 50.

BPH is not cancer, and it does not seem to increase your chance of getting prostate cancer. But the early symptoms are the same. Check with your doctor if you have

  • A frequent and urgent need to urinate, especially at night
  • Trouble starting a urine stream or making more than a dribble
  • A urine stream that is weak, slow, or stops and starts several times
  • The feeling that you still have to go, even just after urinating
  • Small amounts of blood in your urine

Severe BPH can cause serious problems over time, such as urinary tract infections, and bladder or kidney damage. If it is found early, you are less likely to develop these problems.

Tests for BPH include a digital rectal exam, blood and imaging tests, a urine flow study, and examination with a scope called a cystoscope. Treatments include watchful waiting, medicines, nonsurgical procedures, and surgery.

NIH: National Institute of Diabetes and Digestive and Kidney Diseases
indications: benign prostatic hyperplasia (bph) with blood in the urine
condition.name: BPH
symptoms: Frequent or urgent need to urinate, especially at night
Trouble starting a urine stream or making more than a dribble
A urine stream that's weak, slow, or stops and starts several times
The feeling that you have to go, even just after urinating
Small amounts of blood in your urine

indications: Benign prostatic hyperplasia (BPH) with blood in the urine

carousel_items: Take Avodart at the same time every day, with or without food.
Hang in there since it can take up to 3 months before you notice improvements.
You might have a loss of sexual desire or arousal when you first start taking Avodart.
Swallow the capsule whole and don't open it since the powder can irritate your mouth.
Women who can get pregnant shouldn’t touch Avodart.
Tell your doctor if you notice an unusual rash, swelling in your mouth, tightness in your chest, or trouble breathing.

basics.benefits_moa: Avodart blocks the action of 5-alpha-reductase, an enzyme responsible for changing testosterone into dihydrotestosterone (DHT). Lower DHT levels prevents the prostate from growing.
basics.bottom_line: Avodart can be helpful in lowering BPH symtoms and delaying your need for sugery, but it can be pricey.
downsides: Women who can get pregnant shouldn’t touch or handle Avodart.
You need to take Avodart for at least 6 months before your prostate gets small enough for symptoms to improve.
Lowers your PSA level and can hide symptoms of prostate cancer.
Only available as a brand name medicine, so it can be pricey.

downsides_processed.orig: Women who can get pregnant shouldn’t touch or handle Avodart.
You need to take Avodart for at least 6 months before your prostate gets small enough for symptoms to improve.
Lowers your PSA level and can hide symptoms of prostate cancer.
Only available as a brand name medicine, so it can be pricey.

upsides: Improves BPH symptoms, making it easier to urinate.
Patients taking Avodart in clinical trials had a 54-78% chance of seeing improvement in their symptoms.
If you're balding, Avodart can also help your hair grow back.
Most side effects go away after your body gets used to Avodart.
Actually shrinks the size of your prostate, instead of only improving the symptoms like other BPH drugs (eg. Cardura or Hytrin).
Can be combined with Doxazosin (Cardura), an alpha-adrenergic antagonist, if your symptoms are more severe.

upsides_processed.orig: Improves BPH symptoms, making it easier to urinate.
Patients taking Avodart in clinical trials had a 54-78% chance of seeing improvement in their symptoms.
If you're balding, Avodart can also help your hair grow back.
Most side effects go away after your body gets used to Avodart.
Actually shrinks the size of your prostate, instead of only improving the symptoms like other BPH drugs (eg. Cardura or Hytrin).
Can be combined with Doxazosin (Cardura), an alpha-adrenergic antagonist, if your symptoms are more severe.

drugs.one_liner: Improves BPH symptoms and decreases your urgency to urinate.

userStories.tip: My urologist said 6 yrs ago after 60% of the prostate was removed that taking one dose a week would slow subsequent enlargement so later surgery could be avoided. Recently I saw a discussion about its half life and saw it was several weeks.
take it regularly

drugs.name: Avodart

carousel_items_processed.orig: Take Avodart at the same time every day, with or without food.
Hang in there since it can take up to 3 months before you notice improvements.
You might have a loss of sexual desire or arousal when you first start taking Avodart.
Swallow the capsule whole and don't open it since the powder can irritate your mouth.
Women who can get pregnant shouldn’t touch Avodart.
Tell your doctor if you notice an unusual rash, swelling in your mouth, tightness in your chest, or trouble breathing.

risks_warnings.title: Prostate cancer
risks_warnings.description: Compared to placebo (sugar pill), Avodart decreased the overall risk of prostate cancer but may increase the risk of high-grade prostate cancer. In a 7-year follow-up study, men age 55 and older had a higher risk of high-grade prostate cancer when taking Avodart.

description_processed.orig: Compared to placebo (sugar pill), Avodart decreased the overall risk of prostate cancer but may increase the risk of high-grade prostate cancer. In a 7-year follow-up study, men age 55 and older had a higher risk of high-grade prostate cancer when taking Avodart.

risks_warnings.title: Harm to male fetus
risks_warnings.description: Avodart may cause birth defects to a male fetus of a pregnant woman who is exposed to the medicine. Avodart crushed or broken tablets can be absorbed through the skin. The unbroken tablets are coated to prevent this. Women shouldn't be in contact with crushed or broken tablets or semen from a male partner taking Avodart.

description_processed.orig: Avodart may cause birth defects to a male fetus of a pregnant woman who is exposed to the medicine. Avodart crushed or broken tablets can be absorbed through the skin. The unbroken tablets are coated to prevent this. Women shouldn't be in contact with crushed or broken tablets or semen from a male partner taking Avodart.

risks_warnings.title: Sexual problems
risks_warnings.description: It’s not that common, but some people had sexual side effects that continued after they stopped taking Avodart for BPH.  Side effects included problems with erection and orgasm, low sex drive, and reduced amount of sperm. It was more likely to happen in older men, taking medicines that have sexual side effects, and who have conditions that cause sexual problems.
risk_factors: Taking medicines that cause sexual side effects
Medical conditions that cause sexual side effects

description_processed.orig: It’s not that common, but some people had sexual side effects that continued after they stopped taking Avodart for BPH.  Side effects included problems with erection and orgasm, low sex drive, and reduced amount of sperm. It was more likely to happen in older men, taking medicines that have sexual side effects, and who have conditions that cause sexual problems.

risks_warnings.title: Effects on prostate specific antigen (PSA) and detection of prostate cancer
risks_warnings.description: Avodart causes PSA levels to decrease to about 50% of what it was before you started in the first 6 months of treatment. This will be considered your new starting point for PSA testing and any PSA tests you have will be compared to this going forward. PSA levels should be doubled to compare to normal range in men treated with Avodart. Any increase in PSA while taking Avodart may be a sign of prostate cancer and needs to be checked.

description_processed.orig: Avodart causes PSA levels to decrease to about 50% of what it was before you started in the first 6 months of treatment. This will be considered your new starting point for PSA testing and any PSA tests you have will be compared to this going forward. PSA levels should be doubled to compare to normal range in men treated with Avodart. Any increase in PSA while taking Avodart may be a sign of prostate cancer and needs to be checked.

carousel_items: Can cause dizziness or fainting in the first few days.
Check your blood pressure 1 week after starting this medicine, and tell your doctor if it hasn't improved.
Can cause fatigue or headache.
Take the extended release tablet with breakfast.
You might need to check your blood pressure from time to time while taking this medicine.
If side effects don't go away, talk to your doctor about alternatives.

basics.benefits_moa: Doxazosin is a selective alpha blocker. It relaxes the urethra and prostate, which makes it easier to urinate. It also lowers blood pressure by relaxing blood vessels.
basics.bottom_line: For men, Doxazosin will help make it easier to urinate so that you're not getting up a lot at night. It's a last-choice treatment for high blood pressure.
downsides: A last-choice treatment for high blood pressure because other medicines are more effective at preventing heart disease. Your doctor might add it to a medicine you're already taking if your blood pressure is still too high.

downsides_processed.orig: A last-choice treatment for high blood pressure because other medicines are more effective at preventing heart disease. Your doctor might add it to a medicine you're already taking if your blood pressure is still too high.

upsides: A first-choice treatment for enlarged prostate. Makes it easier to urinate.

upsides_processed.orig: A first-choice treatment for enlarged prostate. Makes it easier to urinate.

drugs.one_liner: Lowers blood pressure and makes it easier to urinate.

userStories.tip: It effects your mood after a few weeks and caused anxiety attacks for me after three months. Also headaches and dizziness on a daily basis. Heart consultant told me to stop taking it. Only a 1mg doseage for me but enough to cause problems
userStories.satisfaction: Not worth it, thinking about stopping

userStories.tip: Take it at bedtime everyday for BPH symptoms

drugs.name: Cardura

carousel_items_processed.orig: Can cause dizziness or fainting in the first few days.
Check your blood pressure 1 week after starting this medicine, and tell your doctor if it hasn't improved.
Can cause fatigue or headache.
Take the extended release tablet with breakfast.
You might need to check your blood pressure from time to time while taking this medicine.
If side effects don't go away, talk to your doctor about alternatives.

risks_warnings.title: Low blood pressure
risks_warnings.description: Dizziness or fainting may occur when taking Doxazosin when you change positions, such as going from a seated or lying down position to standing because of changes in your blood pressure, which may lead to falls. This is called orthostatic hypotension. Be very careful when changing positions, especially if you're just starting to take Doxazosin or if changes in dosing have to be made. Talk to your doctor if the dizziness doesn't go away or if you find it bothersome.

description_processed.orig: Dizziness or fainting may occur when taking Doxazosin when you change positions, such as going from a seated or lying down position to standing because of changes in your blood pressure, which may lead to falls. This is called orthostatic hypotension. Be very careful when changing positions, especially if you're just starting to take Doxazosin or if changes in dosing have to be made. Talk to your doctor if the dizziness doesn't go away or if you find it bothersome.

risks_warnings.title: Painful erection
risks_warnings.description: Rare reports of a painful erection unrelieved by sex have been reported by men who take Doxazosin, which is also called priapism. Contact your doctor immediately if you develop this as impotence can happen if this isn't treated in time.

description_processed.orig: Rare reports of a painful erection unrelieved by sex have been reported by men who take Doxazosin, which is also called priapism. Contact your doctor immediately if you develop this as impotence can happen if this isn't treated in time.

risks_warnings.title: Intraoperative floppy iris syndrome
risks_warnings.description: If you are planning to have surgery for cataracts, let your surgeon know that you are taking Doxazosin as a rare condition called intraoperative floppy iris syndrome has been known to happen. Your surgeon will tell you if adjustments need to be made.

description_processed.orig: If you are planning to have surgery for cataracts, let your surgeon know that you are taking Doxazosin as a rare condition called intraoperative floppy iris syndrome has been known to happen. Your surgeon will tell you if adjustments need to be made.

carousel_items: Comes in two differents doses: one that's taken on a regular basis and the other only when you need it.
If you're taking Cialis on a regular basis, take it at the same time every day.
Don't take [name_ommon] more than once a day.
Can be taken with or without food.
Don't drink a lot of alcohol when you're taking this medication since it can make dizziness worse.
If you have an erection for more than 4 hours, go to the ER or call your doctor.
Can cause flushing, headache, and dizziness.

basics.benefits_moa: Cialis is a PDE-5 inhibitor. Blocking PDE-5 allows blood to enter the penis and helps create an erection. Cialis also treats enlarged prostate symptoms.
basics.bottom_line: Cialis is the only medication in its class that treats both erectile dysfunction and enlarged prostate symptoms. You can also take it on a regular basis, which can allow for more spontaneity, but it can be expensive.
downsides: Can't be taken if you've had a heart attack in the past 3 months, or stroke or heart failure in the past 6 months.
Only available as brand name, so it can be expensive.
Side effects can be more pronounced if you're over 65 years.
Can cause flushing, headache, and dizziness, or sudden hearing and vision changes.
Can't use if you've recently taken nitrates like Isordil, Imdur, or nitroglycerin (Nitro-BID, Nitro-Dur, Nitrostat).

downsides_processed.orig: Can't be taken if you've had a heart attack in the past 3 months, or stroke or heart failure in the past 6 months.
Only available as brand name, so it can be expensive.
Side effects can be more pronounced if you're over 65 years.
Can cause flushing, headache, and dizziness, or sudden hearing and vision changes.
Can't use if you've recently taken nitrates like Isordil, Imdur, or nitroglycerin (Nitro-BID, Nitro-Dur, Nitrostat).

upsides: First-choice medication for treating erectile dysfunction.
It's the only one in its class to also treat enlarged prostate symptoms.
Can be taken either as needed, or on a regular basis (which allows you to be more spontaneous before sex).
Can be taken with or without food.
Lasts longer than Viagra.

upsides_processed.orig: First-choice medication for treating erectile dysfunction.
It's the only one in its class to also treat enlarged prostate symptoms.
Can be taken either as needed, or on a regular basis (which allows you to be more spontaneous before sex).
Can be taken with or without food.
Lasts longer than Viagra.

userStories.tip: Dosages are probably too high that are prescribed. Even a tiny dose helps.
Does cause some headaches. Works fast (20 min). Works for 48 (and sometimes more) hours
improved urination as well as improved erections

drugs.name: Cialis

carousel_items_processed.orig: Comes in two differents doses: one that's taken on a regular basis and the other only when you need it.
If you're taking Cialis on a regular basis, take it at the same time every day.
Don't take [name_ommon] more than once a day.
Can be taken with or without food.
Don't drink a lot of alcohol when you're taking this medication since it can make dizziness worse.
If you have an erection for more than 4 hours, go to the ER or call your doctor.
Can cause flushing, headache, and dizziness.

risks_warnings.title: Heart attack or stroke
risks_warnings.description: Taking Cialis for erectile dysfunction can put you at increased risk for heart attack or stroke if you've had problems with your heart in the past. Also, it is not recommended for men to take Cialis if they've had a heart attack in the past 3 months or a stroke or a diagnosis of moderate to severe heart failure in the past 6 months.  Talk to your doctor if you are interested in taking this medication.

description_processed.orig: Taking Cialis for erectile dysfunction can put you at increased risk for heart attack or stroke if you've had problems with your heart in the past. Also, it is not recommended for men to take Cialis if they've had a heart attack in the past 3 months or a stroke or a diagnosis of moderate to severe heart failure in the past 6 months.  Talk to your doctor if you are interested in taking this medication.

risks_warnings.title: Prolonged erection
risks_warnings.description: There have been reports of men having an erection lasting more than 4 hours while on Cialis. This has been rare. If not treated in time, this can cause permanent damage to your penis, including impotence. Talk to your doctor immediately or go to the emergency room if this happens.

description_processed.orig: There have been reports of men having an erection lasting more than 4 hours while on Cialis. This has been rare. If not treated in time, this can cause permanent damage to your penis, including impotence. Talk to your doctor immediately or go to the emergency room if this happens.

risks_warnings.title: Vision changes
risks_warnings.description: There have been reports of men having permanent damage to their vision while on Cialis. This has been rare. Go to the emergency room or call your doctor immediately if you suddenly notice changes in your vision in one or both eyes.

description_processed.orig: There have been reports of men having permanent damage to their vision while on Cialis. This has been rare. Go to the emergency room or call your doctor immediately if you suddenly notice changes in your vision in one or both eyes.

risks_warnings.title: Hearing loss
risks_warnings.description: There have been reports of men having permanent hearing loss while on Cialis. This has been rare. Go to the emergency room or call your doctor immediately if you notice changes in your hearing in one or both ears.

description_processed.orig: There have been reports of men having permanent hearing loss while on Cialis. This has been rare. Go to the emergency room or call your doctor immediately if you notice changes in your hearing in one or both ears.

carousel_items: Take this 30 minutes after the same meal every day.
Can cause dizziness, muscle pain, headache and stuffy/runny nose.
Can cause changes in sex drive.
Don't stop taking this medication suddenly without talking to your doctor.

clock.tip: Works slower when taken with food.

basics.benefits_moa: Tamsulosin is an alpha-1 blocker. It specifically targets and relaxes muscles in your prostate, which makes it easier to urinate.
basics.bottom_line: Tamsulosin is a first-choice treatment for enlarged prostate, and it's available as a generic. However, it can cause changes in your sex drive and can take a while to kick in.
downsides: Has to be taken the same time every day.
It can take up to one month to see the full effects of the medication.
Can reduce sex drive.
Tamsulosin can't be stopped suddenly, so you'll need to talk to your doctor about how to stop taking it safely.
It doesn't shrink the size of the prostate.

downsides_processed.orig: Has to be taken the same time every day.
It can take up to one month to see the full effects of the medication.
Can reduce sex drive.
Tamsulosin can't be stopped suddenly, so you'll need to talk to your doctor about how to stop taking it safely.
It doesn't shrink the size of the prostate.

upsides: First-choice medication for relieving the symptoms of an enlarged prostate.
Helps make urinating easier.
Available as a generic medication.
Also available in a combination form with another medication to treat more severe symptoms of an enlarged prostate.
Since it works only on the muscles around the prostate, it has fewer blood pressure and heart-related side effects than other medicines in the same class.

upsides_processed.orig: First-choice medication for relieving the symptoms of an enlarged prostate.
Helps make urinating easier.
Available as a generic medication.
Also available in a combination form with another medication to treat more severe symptoms of an enlarged prostate.
Since it works only on the muscles around the prostate, it has fewer blood pressure and heart-related side effects than other medicines in the same class.

userStories.tip: Did not work as expected

After a discussion with my doc, I recently upped my one pill Tamsulosin .4 mg dosage to two pills (.8 mg). BIG IMPROVEMENT!. Much better flow and far fewer urges to urinate. So glad I asked about an increased dosage. No side effects.
If I eat the wrong food or inhale the wrong fumes it doesn't work.  Then I have to get a catheter in. Seems like I have a spasm and after a couple hours I'm okay again
may cause atrial fib...so get checked periodically
Once the level was built up I found I could take it every other day.
Took in the morning after breakfast
Retrograde ejaculation, meaning that when you ejaculate, nothing comes out, or very little. This side effect is sporatic, so you never know how much is going to come out. Not a contraceptive!
Weakened ejaculations and reduced semen

drugs.name: Flomax

off-label_indications.indication: Difficulty urinating due to spinal cord injury
condition_url_name: Difficulty urinating due to spinal cord injury

carousel_items_processed.orig: Take this 30 minutes after the same meal every day.
Can cause dizziness, muscle pain, headache and stuffy/runny nose.
Can cause changes in sex drive.
Don't stop taking this medication suddenly without talking to your doctor.

risks_warnings.title: Low blood pressure
risks_warnings.description: People on Tamsulosin can experience lowered blood pressure which can cause dizziness and falls. This usually happens when you first start taking the medication. Your body should adjust to it after the first few days. Be very careful getting up from a sitting or lying down position.
risk_factors: Taking medications for high blood pressure

description_processed.orig: People on Tamsulosin can experience lowered blood pressure which can cause dizziness and falls. This usually happens when you first start taking the medication. Your body should adjust to it after the first few days. Be very careful getting up from a sitting or lying down position.

risks_warnings.title: Rash
risks_warnings.description: There have been reports of severe skin rash that can require hospitalization or can cause death. These have been rare. Talk to your doctor immediately if you suddenly develop a severe blistering skin rash with fever.

description_processed.orig: There have been reports of severe skin rash that can require hospitalization or can cause death. These have been rare. Talk to your doctor immediately if you suddenly develop a severe blistering skin rash with fever.

risks_warnings.title: Intraoperative floppy iris syndrome
risks_warnings.description: If you're going to have eye surgery, let your surgeon know you're taking Tamsulosin since a rare condition can occur to the eyes during the surgery that's caused by the medication.

description_processed.orig: If you're going to have eye surgery, let your surgeon know you're taking Tamsulosin since a rare condition can occur to the eyes during the surgery that's caused by the medication.

risks_warnings.title: Heat stroke
risks_warnings.description: People on Tamsulosin can be more likely to have heat stroke. Drink plenty of fluids if you're going to be in hot weather, especially if you're going to be exercising or drinking alcohol.

description_processed.orig: People on Tamsulosin can be more likely to have heat stroke. Drink plenty of fluids if you're going to be in hot weather, especially if you're going to be exercising or drinking alcohol.

risks_warnings.title: Changes in sex drive
risks_warnings.description: People on Tamsulosin can experience changes in their sex drive. Talk to your doctor if you find this bothers you.

description_processed.orig: People on Tamsulosin can experience changes in their sex drive. Talk to your doctor if you find this bothers you.

carousel_items: Take Proscar once daily, about the same time each day, with or without food.
Women who can get pregnant shouldn’t touch Proscar tablets.
If you’re taking Proscar with doxazosin, you can take both at the same time or take the doxazosin closer to bedtime to avoid dizziness.

basics.benefits_moa: Proscar blocks the action of 5-alpha-reductase, an enzyme responsible for changing testosterone into dihydrotestosterone (DHT). Lower DHT levels prevents the prostate from growing.
basics.bottom_line: Proscar works well for mild to moderate symptoms of BPH. When men have more severe symptoms, it can be combined with doxazosin or other medicines for added benefits.
downsides: Women who can get pregnant shouldn’t handle broken tablets. Proscar tablets are coated and prevent contact with the active medicine unless they split or break.
You need to take Proscar for at least 6 months before your prostate gets small enough for symptoms to improve.
Can cause a rash, the inability to get an erection, low sex drive, and reduced amount of sperm.

Proscar can cause PSA levels to decrease to about 50% of what it was before you started the medication. This will be considered your new starting point for PSA testing and any PSA tests you have will be compared to this going forward.

downsides_processed.orig: Women who can get pregnant shouldn’t handle broken tablets. Proscar tablets are coated and prevent contact with the active medicine unless they split or break.
You need to take Proscar for at least 6 months before your prostate gets small enough for symptoms to improve.
Can cause a rash, the inability to get an erection, low sex drive, and reduced amount of sperm.

Proscar can cause PSA levels to decrease to about 50% of what it was before you started the medication. This will be considered your new starting point for PSA testing and any PSA tests you have will be compared to this going forward.

upsides: It's an option for men who have symptoms of benign prostatic hyperplasia (BPH) and either don’t want surgery or aren’t good candidates it.
In studies, Proscar improved BPH symptoms during the first year of taking it. This effect continued for another 5 years.
Men taking Proscar have less difficulty urinating and don't need BPH-related surgery as often as others.
Can be combined with doxazosin, an alpha-adrenergic antagonist, if your symptoms are more severe. Using both together can improve symptoms and improve BPH symptoms.

upsides_processed.orig: It's an option for men who have symptoms of benign prostatic hyperplasia (BPH) and either don’t want surgery or aren’t good candidates it.
In studies, Proscar improved BPH symptoms during the first year of taking it. This effect continued for another 5 years.
Men taking Proscar have less difficulty urinating and don't need BPH-related surgery as often as others.
Can be combined with doxazosin, an alpha-adrenergic antagonist, if your symptoms are more severe. Using both together can improve symptoms and improve BPH symptoms.

If you’re taking Proscar with doxazosin, you can take both at the same time or take the doxazosin closer to bedtime to avoid dizziness.

risks_warnings.title: Effects on prostate specific antigen (PSA) and detection of prostate cancer
risks_warnings.description: Proscar causes PSA levels to decrease to about 50% of what it was before you started in the first 6 months of treatment. This will be considered your new starting point for PSA testing and any PSA tests you have will be compared to this going forward. PSA levels should be doubled to compare to normal range in men treated with Proscar. Any increase in PSA while taking Proscar may be a sign of prostate cancer and needs to be checked.

description_processed.orig: Proscar causes PSA levels to decrease to about 50% of what it was before you started in the first 6 months of treatment. This will be considered your new starting point for PSA testing and any PSA tests you have will be compared to this going forward. PSA levels should be doubled to compare to normal range in men treated with Proscar. Any increase in PSA while taking Proscar may be a sign of prostate cancer and needs to be checked.

risks_warnings.title: Prostate cancer
risks_warnings.description: Compared to placebo (sugar pill), Proscar decreased the overall risk of prostate cancer but may increase the risk of high-grade prostate cancer. In a 7-year follow-up study, men age 55 and older had a higher risk of high-grade prostate cancer when taking Proscar.

description_processed.orig: Compared to placebo (sugar pill), Proscar decreased the overall risk of prostate cancer but may increase the risk of high-grade prostate cancer. In a 7-year follow-up study, men age 55 and older had a higher risk of high-grade prostate cancer when taking Proscar.

risks_warnings.title: Harm to male fetus
risks_warnings.description: Proscar may cause birth defects to a male fetus of a pregnant woman who is exposed to the medicine. Proscar crushed or broken tablets can be absorbed through the skin. The unbroken tablets are coated to prevent this. Women shouldn't be in contact with crushed or broken tablets or semen from a male partner taking Proscar.

description_processed.orig: Proscar may cause birth defects to a male fetus of a pregnant woman who is exposed to the medicine. Proscar crushed or broken tablets can be absorbed through the skin. The unbroken tablets are coated to prevent this. Women shouldn't be in contact with crushed or broken tablets or semen from a male partner taking Proscar.

risks_warnings.title: Increased side effects
risks_warnings.description: Proscar is processed by the liver. If you have liver problems, you may need a different dose to prevent increased risk for side effects.

description_processed.orig: Proscar is processed by the liver. If you have liver problems, you may need a different dose to prevent increased risk for side effects.

risks_warnings.title: Sexual problems
risks_warnings.description: It’s not that common, but some people had sexual side effects that continued after they stopped taking Proscar for BPH.  Side effects included problems with erection and orgasm, low sex drive, and reduced amount of sperm. It was more likely to happen in older men, taking medicines that have sexual side effects, and had conditions that cause sexual problems.
risk_factors: Taking medicines that cause sexual side effects
Medical conditions that cause sexual side effects

description_processed.orig: It’s not that common, but some people had sexual side effects that continued after they stopped taking Proscar for BPH.  Side effects included problems with erection and orgasm, low sex drive, and reduced amount of sperm. It was more likely to happen in older men, taking medicines that have sexual side effects, and had conditions that cause sexual problems.

points.name: Ejaculation disorder
points.hlt: erection and ejaculation conditions and disorders

points.name: Ejaculation disorder
points.hlt: erection and ejaculation conditions and disorders

carousel_items: It's best to take Levitra about 1 hour before sexual activity, but you can take it anywhere between 4 hours and 30 minutes before you need it.
Don't take it more than once a day.
If you have an erection for more than 4 hours, go to the ER or call your doctor.
Can cause flushing, a headache, or dizziness.

basics.benefits_moa: Levitra is a PDE-5 inhibitor. Blocking PDE-5 allows blood to enter the penis and helps create an erection.
basics.bottom_line: Levitra is a first-choice treatment for erectile dysfunction. However, you have to take it at least 60 minutes prior to sex, so the lack of spontaneity may not be good for some people. It can also be expensive.
downsides: Needs to be taken at least 60 minutes before sex.
Only available as brand name, so it can be expensive.
You need to reduce the amount of grapefruit you eat while taking Levitra.
Can cause flushing, headache, and dizziness, or sudden hearing and vision changes.
Can't use if you've recently taken nitrates like Isordil, Imdur, or nitroglycerin (Nitro-BID, Nitro-Dur, Nitrostat).

downsides_processed.orig: Needs to be taken at least 60 minutes before sex.
Only available as brand name, so it can be expensive.
You need to reduce the amount of grapefruit you eat while taking Levitra.
Can cause flushing, headache, and dizziness, or sudden hearing and vision changes.
Can't use if you've recently taken nitrates like Isordil, Imdur, or nitroglycerin (Nitro-BID, Nitro-Dur, Nitrostat).

upsides: First-choice medication for treating erectile dysfunction.
It can be taken only when you need it.
It can be taken with or without food.
Available in two different forms, as a regular tablet and as an orally-disintegrating tablet.

upsides_processed.orig: First-choice medication for treating erectile dysfunction.
It can be taken only when you need it.
It can be taken with or without food.
Available in two different forms, as a regular tablet and as an orally-disintegrating tablet.

drugs.name: Levitra

carousel_items_processed.orig: It's best to take Levitra about 1 hour before sexual activity, but you can take it anywhere between 4 hours and 30 minutes before you need it.
Don't take it more than once a day.
If you have an erection for more than 4 hours, go to the ER or call your doctor.
Can cause flushing, a headache, or dizziness.

risks_warnings.title: Heart attack or stroke
risks_warnings.description: Taking Levitra for erectile dysfunction can put you at increased risk for heart attack or stroke if you've had problems with your heart in the past, especially in the past 6 months and is not recommended. Talk to your doctor if you are interested in taking this medication.
risk_factors: Having a heart attack, stroke, or rhythm problem in your heart in the last 6 months
Having low or high blood pressure
Heart failure or coronary artery disease causing unstable angina (chest pain)

description_processed.orig: Taking Levitra for erectile dysfunction can put you at increased risk for heart attack or stroke if you've had problems with your heart in the past, especially in the past 6 months and is not recommended. Talk to your doctor if you are interested in taking this medication.

risks_warnings.title: Prolonged erection
risks_warnings.description: There have been reports of men having an erection lasting more than 4 hours while on Levitra. This has been rare. If not treated in time, this can cause permanent damage to your penis, including impotence. Talk to your doctor immediately or go to the emergency room if this happens.

description_processed.orig: There have been reports of men having an erection lasting more than 4 hours while on Levitra. This has been rare. If not treated in time, this can cause permanent damage to your penis, including impotence. Talk to your doctor immediately or go to the emergency room if this happens.

risks_warnings.title: Vision changes
risks_warnings.description: There have been reports of men having permanent damage to their vision while on Levitra. This has been rare. Go to the emergency room or call your doctor immediately if you suddenly notice changes in your vision in one or both eyes.

description_processed.orig: There have been reports of men having permanent damage to their vision while on Levitra. This has been rare. Go to the emergency room or call your doctor immediately if you suddenly notice changes in your vision in one or both eyes.

risks_warnings.title: Hearing loss
risks_warnings.description: There have been reports of men having permanent hearing loss while on Levitra. This has been rare. Go to the emergency room or call your doctor immediately if you notice changes in your hearing in one or both ears.

description_processed.orig: There have been reports of men having permanent hearing loss while on Levitra. This has been rare. Go to the emergency room or call your doctor immediately if you notice changes in your hearing in one or both ears.

risks_warnings.title: Low blood pressure
risks_warnings.description: If you're taking alpha blockers or medications for high blood pressure and you're taking Levitra, your blood pressure may become too low. Be very careful getting up from a sitting or lying down position since this can make you feel dizzy and more likely to fall. Talk to your doctor if your medications need to be changed.
risk_factors: Taking medications for high blood pressure

description_processed.orig: If you're taking alpha blockers or medications for high blood pressure and you're taking Levitra, your blood pressure may become too low. Be very careful getting up from a sitting or lying down position since this can make you feel dizzy and more likely to fall. Talk to your doctor if your medications need to be changed.

risks_warnings.title: Heart rhythm problems
risks_warnings.description: If you're taking medications to control your heart rhythm, taking Levitra can make the rhythm worse. Talk to your doctor to see if you need an alternate medication for your erectile dysfunction.
risk_factors: Taking medications to control your heart rhythm

description_processed.orig: If you're taking medications to control your heart rhythm, taking Levitra can make the rhythm worse. Talk to your doctor to see if you need an alternate medication for your erectile dysfunction.

points.name: Back pain
points.hlt: musculoskeletal and connective tissue pain and discomfort

points.name: gastroesophageal reflux disease
points.hlt: gastrointestinal atonic and hypomotility disorders nec

points.name: sinus congestion
points.hlt: paranasal sinus disorders (excl infections and neoplasms)

points.name: ocular hyperemia
points.hlt: ocular infections, inflammations and associated manifestations

points.name: priapism
points.hlt: erection and ejaculation conditions and disorders

carousel_items: Check your blood pressure 1 week after starting this medicine, and tell your doctor if it hasn't improved.
Can cause drowsiness, headache, dizziness, and nausea.
Take with food or at bedtime to avoid side effects.
If side effects don't go away, talk to your doctor about alternatives.
Recheck your blood pressure 1 week after starting this medicine.

basics.benefits_moa: Prazosin is a selective alpha blocker. It lowers blood pressure by relaxing blood vessels. It also relaxes the urethra and prostate, which makes it easier to urinate.
basics.bottom_line: Prazosin is used mostly to make urination easier for men with an enlarged prostate, but it can cause dizziness.
downsides: Not the best medicine to lower blood pressure by itself.
Likely to cause orthostatic hypotension. This means dizziness when you change positions (like standing up) because your blood pressure doesn't adjust quickly enough.
Not preferred for people 65 years or older.

downsides_processed.orig: Not the best medicine to lower blood pressure by itself.
Likely to cause orthostatic hypotension. This means dizziness when you change positions (like standing up) because your blood pressure doesn't adjust quickly enough.
Not preferred for people 65 years or older.

upsides: Can be added to other blood pressure-lowering medicines if you need additional blood pressure control.
Makes urination easier in men with an enlarged prostate.
Helps people with PTSD get better sleep with fewer, less-intense nightmares.

upsides_processed.orig: Can be added to other blood pressure-lowering medicines if you need additional blood pressure control.
Makes urination easier in men with an enlarged prostate.
Helps people with PTSD get better sleep with fewer, less-intense nightmares.

drugs.one_liner: Lowers blood pressure and makes it easier to urinate.
drugs.name: Prazosin

carousel_items_processed.orig: Check your blood pressure 1 week after starting this medicine, and tell your doctor if it hasn't improved.
Can cause drowsiness, headache, dizziness, and nausea.
Take with food or at bedtime to avoid side effects.
If side effects don't go away, talk to your doctor about alternatives.
Recheck your blood pressure 1 week after starting this medicine.

risks_warnings.title: Low blood pressure (orthostatic hypotension)
risks_warnings.description: You can feel dizzy or fall from a sudden drop in blood pressure when you change positions, such as going from sitting to standing. This is called orthostatic hypotension. If you're sensitive to low blood pressure, change position slowly until your body is used to the medicine. If symptoms continues for more than a week, dose adjustment or a different medication may be needed.

description_processed.orig: You can feel dizzy or fall from a sudden drop in blood pressure when you change positions, such as going from sitting to standing. This is called orthostatic hypotension. If you're sensitive to low blood pressure, change position slowly until your body is used to the medicine. If symptoms continues for more than a week, dose adjustment or a different medication may be needed.

points.name: Constipation
points.hlt: gastrointestinal atonic and hypomotility disorders nec

carousel_items: Take Proscar once daily, about the same time each day, with or without food.
Women who can get pregnant shouldn’t touch Proscar tablets.
If you’re taking Proscar with doxazosin, you can take both at the same time or take the doxazosin closer to bedtime to avoid dizziness.

basics.benefits_moa: Proscar blocks the action of 5-alpha-reductase, an enzyme responsible for changing testosterone into dihydrotestosterone (DHT). Lower DHT levels prevents the prostate from growing.
basics.bottom_line: Proscar works well for mild to moderate symptoms of BPH. When men have more severe symptoms, it can be combined with doxazosin or other medicines for added benefits.
downsides: Women who can get pregnant shouldn’t handle broken tablets. Proscar tablets are coated and prevent contact with the active medicine unless they split or break.
You need to take Proscar for at least 6 months before your prostate gets small enough for symptoms to improve.
Can cause a rash, the inability to get an erection, low sex drive, and reduced amount of sperm.

Proscar can cause PSA levels to decrease to about 50% of what it was before you started the medication. This will be considered your new starting point for PSA testing and any PSA tests you have will be compared to this going forward.

downsides_processed.orig: Women who can get pregnant shouldn’t handle broken tablets. Proscar tablets are coated and prevent contact with the active medicine unless they split or break.
You need to take Proscar for at least 6 months before your prostate gets small enough for symptoms to improve.
Can cause a rash, the inability to get an erection, low sex drive, and reduced amount of sperm.

Proscar can cause PSA levels to decrease to about 50% of what it was before you started the medication. This will be considered your new starting point for PSA testing and any PSA tests you have will be compared to this going forward.

upsides: It's an option for men who have symptoms of benign prostatic hyperplasia (BPH) and either don’t want surgery or aren’t good candidates it.
In studies, Proscar improved BPH symptoms during the first year of taking it. This effect continued for another 5 years.
Men taking Proscar have less difficulty urinating and don't need BPH-related surgery as often as others.
Can be combined with doxazosin, an alpha-adrenergic antagonist, if your symptoms are more severe. Using both together can improve symptoms and improve BPH symptoms.

upsides_processed.orig: It's an option for men who have symptoms of benign prostatic hyperplasia (BPH) and either don’t want surgery or aren’t good candidates it.
In studies, Proscar improved BPH symptoms during the first year of taking it. This effect continued for another 5 years.
Men taking Proscar have less difficulty urinating and don't need BPH-related surgery as often as others.
Can be combined with doxazosin, an alpha-adrenergic antagonist, if your symptoms are more severe. Using both together can improve symptoms and improve BPH symptoms.

Side effects included problems with erection and orgasm, low sex drive, and reduced amount of sperm. It was more likely to happen in older men, taking medicines that have sexual side effects, and had conditions that cause sexual problems.

Medical conditions that cause sexual side effects

points.name: Ejaculation disorder
points.hlt: erection and ejaculation conditions and disorders

points.name: Ejaculation disorder
points.hlt: erection and ejaculation conditions and disorders

carousel_items: Take Propecia at the same time every day, with or without food.
Hang in there; it can take up to 3 months before you notice any improvement.
You might have a loss of sexual desire or arousal in the beginning.
It's normal to experience hair shedding in the first few months.
Tell your doctor if you notice an unusual rash, swelling of the mouth, tightness in the chest, or trouble breathing.
Using Nizoral shampoo with Propecia greatly helps stop hair loss.

basics.benefits_moa: Propecia is a 5 alpha-reductase inhibitor. It stops dihydrotestosterone (DHT) from shrinking your hair follicles and preventing hair growth. Without DHT, your hair can grow more normally.
basics.bottom_line: Propecia works great for crown balding, as long as you keep taking it.
downsides: Only good for the crown of the head. If you have a receding hairline, Propecia may not work.
If you stop taking it, you will lose the hair you grew while on it.
You need to have your blood tested regularly for signs of prostate cancer while taking Propecia.
Sexual side effects can continue after you stop taking Propecia.
Should never be used by women or children.

downsides_processed.orig: Only good for the crown of the head. If you have a receding hairline, Propecia may not work.
If you stop taking it, you will lose the hair you grew while on it.
You need to have your blood tested regularly for signs of prostate cancer while taking Propecia.
Sexual side effects can continue after you stop taking Propecia.
Should never be used by women or children.

upsides: Helped regrow hair in 88% of men.
Comes in a generic form.
Is useful as a supplemental treatment to hair transplant surgery.
Most side effects go away after your body gets used to Propecia.
Helps shrink the prostate gland.

upsides_processed.orig: Helped regrow hair in 88% of men.
Comes in a generic form.
Is useful as a supplemental treatment to hair transplant surgery.
Most side effects go away after your body gets used to Propecia.
Helps shrink the prostate gland.

userStories.tip: Horrible toxin. Took it for 4 weeks and it destroyed my life. There are thousands of men from every corner of the globe that have been destroyed by this drug..

This drug blocks more than just DHT, it blocks the production of 6 other neurosteroids which can result in anxiety, major depression, brain fog, muscle loss, estrogen dominance and much more. This drug literally ruined my life.
sometimes I stop taking it till I notice my hair loss increase then restart it.

Start taking Propecia before you have a lot of hair loss to save what you have.  It's not a miracle drug that is going to make a bald person have a thick head of hair, but will help you to save what you have.
No obvious effect compared to Flomax, MD says it is insurance

drugs.name: Propecia

off-label_indications.indication: Benign prostatic hyperplasia (BPH) with blood in the urine

carousel_items_processed.orig: Take Propecia at the same time every day, with or without food.
Hang in there; it can take up to 3 months before you notice any improvement.
You might have a loss of sexual desire or arousal in the beginning.
It's normal to experience hair shedding in the first few months.
Tell your doctor if you notice an unusual rash, swelling of the mouth, tightness in the chest, or trouble breathing.
Using Nizoral shampoo with Propecia greatly helps stop hair loss.

risks_warnings.title: Exposure to pregnant women
risks_warnings.description: Pregnant women should never handle crushed or broken tablets of Propecia because it can cause really serious birth defects in babies.

description_processed.orig: Pregnant women should never handle crushed or broken tablets of Propecia because it can cause really serious birth defects in babies.

risks_warnings.title: Effects on Prostate Specific Antigen (PSA)
risks_warnings.description: The 5mg form of Propecia is used to treat benign prostatic hyperplasia (BPH). In studies, the 1 mg tablet was also able to lower prostate specific antigen (PSA) levels. If PSA levels increase, men taking Propecia should be tested for prostate cancer.

description_processed.orig: The 5mg form of Propecia is used to treat benign prostatic hyperplasia (BPH). In studies, the 1 mg tablet was also able to lower prostate specific antigen (PSA) levels. If PSA levels increase, men taking Propecia should be tested for prostate cancer.

risks_warnings.title: High-grade prostate cancer
risks_warnings.description: In 5 mg doses, 5-alpha reductase inhibitors like Propecia, were shown to increase the chances of high-grade prostate cancer in men over the age of 55.

description_processed.orig: In 5 mg doses, 5-alpha reductase inhibitors like Propecia, were shown to increase the chances of high-grade prostate cancer in men over the age of 55.
